summary: A young man gains significant political influence as the leader of a counterculture rock band with his rallying cry of voting rights for teenagers.
cast: Shelley Winters|Christopher Jones|Diane Varsi|Hal Holbrook|Millie Perkins|Richard Pryor|Bert Freed|Kevin Coughlin|Larry Bishop|May Ishihara|Salli Sachse|Kellie Flanagan|Don Wyndham|Michael Margotta|Ed Begley|Martin Abrahams|Army Archerd|Kenneth Banghart|Baynes Barron|Melvin Belli|Russ Bender|Gary Busey|Dick Clark|Paul Frees|Sig Frohlich|Harley Hatcher|Lars Hensen|Eugene Jackson|Richard LaMarr|Jack Latham|Louis Lomax|Cynthia MacAdams|Pamela Mason|William Meader|Allan J. Moll|Bill Mumy|Emma Palmese|Jose Portugal|Paul Power|Paul Ravel|Guy Raymond|Clark Ross|Jeffrey Sayre|Gene Shacove|Bobby Sherman|Norman Stevans|Peter Tork|Barry Williams|Walter Winchell
title: El presidente
